author: affiliates@fandango.com
title: 7. CHIPS $7.6M
text: Hilarious By jhalleps Of course this movie is raunchy, it's like 21 Jump street and We're the Millers rolled into and hour and a half long explosion and laughter festival. If you love college humor, explosions, and pretty... By Bobbi Pierce Was well done! Funny, and had just enough action and other things to keep it fun.... Good laughs If you just want to laugh this is ur movie. Stupid funny... Does exactly what it says on the tin By Mikejbeveridge Dont understand the pompous critics, this isn't supposed to be Othello . Great fun movie entertaining all the way thru.... Funny! It was funny! I have never seen the old Chips but good movie... Great movie This movie is so funny I give it five stars... NOT!!! By beckersdc REALLY? I'm glad Michael Pena was able to land a role in this film as I'm a fan, but it falls short of what could be a good movie. I actually walked OUT!!! Too crude for me.... Very funny! By Cyrus_7 At first I didn't want to go but a friend talked me into it. Glad I went. It was very funny. Don't listen to critics on this one. I laughed through the whole thing.... By bunbunhxc
